title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.9 - Lodging prices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.9 - Lodging prices

State Regulations

Emergency lodging in hotels, boarding houses and other
buildings used for emergency lodging including billets in private homes, shall
be rented at not in excess of the prices established in a fair rent schedule by
the local director and approved by the State commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
